summary: I HAVE HAD THIS PROBLEM OFF AND ON SINCE 1997 HAVE PUT IN THREE ECM COMPUTERS WHY WAS THIS PROBLEM NEVER ADDRESSED BY MANUFACTURER CHECK OUT THIS SITE -HTTP://WWW.90GSX.COM/ECLIPSE/CAP/CAPS.HTM  ALONG WITH OIL LEAKAGE RECALL OF 97-98 WHICH I WAS NEVER INFORMED OF & JUST FOUND OUT WITH MY CAR LEAKING OIL EVERY WARE & NOW POWER STEERING LEAKAGE FROM STEERING KNUCKLE SPINDLE ARM THAT WAS RECALLED IN JAPAN 2001  BUT NOT HERE ! HELP  *TR
TRANSMISSION FAILURE TO SHIFT TO THIRD GEAR AFTER REPLACING TRANSMISSION WITH OTHER UNIT LESS THAN A YEAR AGO. ( APRIL 2005) MAKES A LOUD BANG WHEN DOWNSHIFTING TO 1ST GEAR UPON STOPPING.  *NM

PURCHASED A VEHICLE AT EASTABOGA AUTO SALES. DROVE THE CAR FOR 1 DAY THE TRANSMISSION STARTED ACTING UP I TOOK IT BACK TO WHERE I BOUGHT IT HE TOLD ME TO DRIVE IT A COUPLE OF DAYS BECAUSE HE HAD JUST PUT A NEW MOTOR IN IT AND IT HAD BEEN SITTING UP FOR ABOUT 8 MONTHS TO DRIVE IT AND LET EVERYTHING  GET BROKEN IN.SO THE NEXT DAY I WENT TO DRIVE IT AND IT WOULDNT MOVE . SO IT SIT IN MY YARD FOR ANOTHER DAY. FINALLY IHAD TO HAVE MY HUSBAND PUSH ME TO GET IT BACK TO WHERE I BOUGHT IT .HE SAID HE'D FIND A TRANSMISSION SO NOW HE WANTS ME TO PY $900.00 TO FIX IT AND ALL I WANT HIM TO DO IS GIVE ME MY MONEY BACK BECAUSE HE HAS THE CAR. BUT HE REFUSES TO DO ANYTHING. WHAT AM I SUPPOSE TO DO?

RIGHT BOOT HAS SELF DESTRUCTED FOR THE THIRD TIME (THE FIRST TIME WAS AROUND 35000 & I WAS TOLD THEY SHOULD BE GOOD FOR AT LEAST 60000 - THE LEFT ONE WAS).  LEFT BOOT HAS ONLY HAD TO BE REPLACED 1 TIME (AROUND 65000)& WAS NOT AS BADLY DAMAGED AS THE RIGHT HAS BEEN EVERY TIME.  I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW IF OTHER PEOPLE HAVE BEEN HAVING THIS SAME PROBLEM & WHAT CAN BE DONE ABOUT IT.  COMPUTER CHIP DIED AROUND 95000 EVEN THOUGH I WAS TOLD IT WOULD LAST LONGER.  FRIEND'S MITSUBISHI CHIP DIED ALSO BUT IT WAS AT 120000.  REPAIR SHOP STATED THEY HAVE HAD MANY MITSUBISHI COMPUTER CHIP PROBLEM CARS BROUGHT IN - MOST PEOPLE JUNK THE CAR BECAUSE IT'S SO EXPENSIVE TO FIX. I HAD TO REPLACE A WORN BELT ("GOOD FOR 60000") AT 25000. GEAR SHIFT CABLE BROKE A FEW MONTHS AFTER I BOUGHT THE CAR (NEW). ARE THESE PROBLEMS OTHER PEOPLE HAVE HAD?
REQUIRED REPLACEMENT OF BOTH FRONT AXLES IN 1991 MITSUBISHI GALANT AFTER ONLY 55,577 MILES.*AK

I WANT TO FILE A COMPLAIN ABOUT THE ECU FAILURE OF MY 91 MITSUBISHI GALANT. I BOUGHT THIS CAR USED THREE YEARS AGO. RECENTLY, THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON, THE ERROR CODE SHOWED A BAD BAROMETRIC PRESSURE SENSOR. I REPLACED IT AND COULDN'T FIX THE PROBLEM. A SHOP REPLACED IT AGAIN AND THE ERROR CODE WAS STILL THERE. THEY FINALLY DIAGNOZED A BAD ECU. I HAVE HEARD A LOT OF COMPLAINS ABOUT THE EARLY 90S MITSUBISHI GALANT ECU AND HAVE KNOWN AT LEAST TWO OTHER PEOPLE HAVE THE SAME ISSUE. ONE OF MY FRIENDS HAD THE SAME CAR BEFORE, AND THE CAR WAS TOTALLY DEAD ON THE HIGHWAY BECAUSE OF THE ECU FAILURE. FORTUNATELY HE WAS NOT INJURED. HOWEVER, IT'S DEFINITELY A SEVERE ISSUE. I KNOW ANOTHER GUY HAS THE SAME CAR WHEN I AM DOING THE REPAIR. HE HAD A BAD ECU TOO. I AM WONDERING IF YOU HAVE RECEIVED SIMILAR COMPLAINS REGARDING THE ECU.

VEHICLE HAD A RECALL DONE ON VEHICLE REGARDING  TRANSFER CASE A FEW YEARS AGO. CURRENTLY, PROBLEM HAS REOCCURRED AGAIN.  TRANSFER CASE WILL LOCK UP WHILE CONSUMER IS DRIVING. PLEASE PROVIDE FURTHER INFORMATION.AK

OVERDRIVE FLUID IS LEAKING, ABOUT A YEAR AGO THE CONSUMER TOOK VEHICLE INTO THE DEALER TO GET  RECALL  REPAIRS DONE, BUT ALL  DEALER DID WAS TAKE A LOOK AT  VEHICLE. THEN, DETERMINED THAT THE VEHICLE WAS NOT LEAKING. THEY DID NOT REPLACE ANYTHING.  CURRENTLY, THEY DO NOT WANT TO DO ANYTHING ABOUT IT.*AK  RECALL CAMPAIGN 98V16800.  *MJ
VEHICLE WAS PARKED AND THERE WAS FLUID LEAKING FROM UNDERNEATH.  CONSUMER RECEIVED A RECALL LETTER  98V16800 FOR  TRASNFER CASE.  HE IS STILL HAVING PROBLEM SINCE RECALL REPAIRS  HAVE BEEN  DONE.*AK
WHILE TRAVELING 60 MPH AND WITHOUT ANY INDICATION ALL FOUR WHEELS LOCKED UP. VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO DEALER, TECHNICIAN STATED TRANSFER CASE NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. PLEASE PROVIDE FURTHER INFORMATION.*AK
CAR WHILE DRIVING STARTS IDLING AND THEN STARTS CLICKING INSIDE AND THE SHUTS OFF THEN STARTS RIGHT BACK UP AGAIN ALSO BURNS OIL. *AK

WHEN ENGINE OR TRANSMISSION IS COLD AND CONSUMER STEPS ON BRAKES, TRANSMISSION WON'T DOWNSHIFT FROM A HIGH SPEED. VEHICLE FEELS LIKE IT IS GOING STRAIGHT THROUGH A LIGHT.  SOMETIMES, THERE'S A LOUD BANG WHEN STOPPING.*AK   *SLC
WHEN  VEHICLE IS BEING DRIVEN IT IS VERY SLUGGISH AND DOES NOT PICK UP SPEED, CAUSE UNKNOWN.  PLEASE GIVE ANY FURTHER DETAILS.*AK

MY 1991 MITSUBISHI GALANT STALLED WHILE DRIVING 3 TIMES OVER 3 MONTHS.  ONE DAY, THE CAR WOULDN'T START AFTER DRIVING IT TO WORK.  THE ELECTRONIC CONTROL UNIT WAS REPLACED IN A SHOP.  THE CAR THEN HAD SEVERE HARD IDLING PROBLEMS.  THE SERVO WAS THEN REPLACED.  THE IDLING PROBLEM WAS NOT FIXED AND IS STILL PRESENT.  NOW THE CAR HAS TROUBLE STARTING WITH A BRAND NEW COMPUTER.

VEHICLE EXPERIENCED A NO START CONDITION ABOUT EVERY 4 DAYS. DEALER HAS REPLACED BATTERIES  4 TIMES, AND TOOK COMPUTER OUT, AND WAS SENT TO HOUSTON,  BUT COULD NOT DETERMINE CAUSE, AND  WAS NOT WILLING TO HELP CONSUMER.  *AK
EXCESSIVE BRAKE FLUID LEAK.   DEALER HAS REPLACED  BRAKES THREE TIMES.  PLEASE PROVIDE FURTHER DETAILS.  *AK
CONSUMER IS REQUESTING THAT RECALL 98V168 BE COMPLETED ON VEHICLE, THE DEALER IS CHARGING FOR PARTS THAT THE CONSUMER FEELS ARE NOT NEEDED AND ONLY WANTS THE RECALL REPAIR DONE.   *SLC

THE VEHICLES MAIN COMPUTER HAS BEEN REPLACED SEVERAL TIMES WHICH CAUSES THE VEHICLE TO STALL WHILE DRIVING, THE VEHICLE IS ALSO EXPERIENCING CRONIC ELECTRICAL SYSTEM PROBLEM WITH THE LIGHTS, RADIO AND ALARM.  NLM
CONSUMER WAS TOLD BY THE DEALERSHIP THAT THE RECALL REPAIR (98V-168) COULD NOT BE COMPLETED UNTIL THEY FIXED A TRANSMISSION LEAK WHICH WOULD COST $500.   *MJS
TIMING BELT FAILED.   *MJS
NO SUMMARY LISTED FOR ABOVE VEHICLE. *AK

RECALL # 98V168001 POWER TRAIN: TRANSFER CASE (4-WHEEL DRIVE) DEALER STATED THAT RECALL WORK WAS PERFORMED SOME TIME AGO. EVEN THOUGH RECALL WORK WAS PERFORMED CONSUMER IS EXPERIENCING LEAKS AND NOISES COMING FROM THE TRANSFER CASE. VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO ANOTHER DEALERSHIP ABOUT A MONTH AGO. DEALERSHIP STATED THAT THE TRANSFER CASE WAS SHOT, MEANING THAT IT WAS EMPTY.  *AK

I WAS TOLD BY A NHTSA CONSELOR THAT I HAD TO FILL OUT THIS FORM TO SOLVE MY PROBLEM. I HAVE A 1991 MITUBISHIU GALANT VR4 . THIS VEHICAL HAS AN AWD DRIVETRAION . TO MY KNOWLAGE ALL MITUBISHI VEHICALS WITH THIS FEATURE BETWEEN 1990 TO 1998 WERE RECALLED. I PERSONALY KNOW ABOUT 40 OTHER 1991 MITUBISHI GALANT OWNERS WHO HAD THE RECALL PERFORMED. FOR SOME REASON THEY (THE MANUFACTURER ) REFUSED MY VIN # . I HAVE DOCUMENTATION FROM A PREVIOUSE DEALER THAT MY DIFIRENTIAL WAS DAMAGED AND IS LEAKING. THIS WAS TOLD TO ME BEFORE I KNEW ABOUT THE RECALL. I WAS GOING TO PAY FOR THE REPAIR BUT WAS INFORMED BY YOUR WEB SITE THAT MY VEHICAL WAS (?) PART OF THE RECALL. I BELIEVE THAT MITUBISHI REALISED THAT MY VEHIVAL WILL REQUIRE THE REPLACED DIFFIRENTIAL AND THAT IS WHY THEY ARE DENINING IT. ANY INFO THAT I COULD GIVE THEM TO PERSUADE THEM INTO PERFORMING (JUST THE INSPECTION ) WOULD BE GREAT. THEY HAVE REFUSED TO EVEN LOOK AT MY CAR UNDER THE RECALL.  *AK

I BOUGHT A 1991 MITSUBISHI GALANT LS 4DR FROM A LOCAL DEALER(YORKTOWN MITSUBISHI, NEW YORK) 4 MONTHS AGO. A FEW DAYS AGO WHILE DRIVING MY CAR, THE ECU UNIT (ELECTRONIC CONTROL MODULE) BURNED OUT AND ALL OF THE POWER IN THE CAR SUBSEQUENTLY SHUT OFF. KEEP IN MIND THAT THE FUSE DID NOT BLOW WHEN THIS HAPPENED WHICH INDICATES THAT IT WAS THE PART ITSELF WHICH MALFUNCTIONED AND NOT SOME OTHER ELECTRICAL SOURCE. IT WAS A GOOD THING THAT I WAS NOT DRIVING ON THE HIGHWAY, OTHERWISE I WOULD HAVE BEEN IN REAL TROUBLE. ANYWAY, AFTER TAKING WITH SEVERAL DEALERS, I WAS TOLD THAT THE "ECUS" "HAVE BEEN KNOWN TO GO (BURN OUT)". THE DEMAND FOR THIS PART IS VERY AS WELL AS THE PRICE $800 WHILE THE SUPPLY IS VERY LOW. A COUPLE OF DEALERS TOLD ME THAT SEVERAL CUSTOMERS HAVE EXPERIENCED THIS PROBLEM, REPLACED THE UNIT WITH A NEW ONE AND IT BURN OUT AGAIN, SOME OF THEM TWICE MORE. SINCE THIS PROBLEM HAS OCURRED TO SEVERAL OTHERS AND PRESENTS SERIOUS SAFETY CONCERN, I DEEM IT NECESSARILY WORTHY OF AN INVESTIGATION OF SOME SORT , PERHAPS LEADING TO A RECALL.  *AK
NO SUMMARY LISTED FOR THIS VEHICLE.  *AK

TRANSFER CASE LOCKS UP REAR WHEELS, CAUSING A 75 FOOT SKID. THE CAR WAS TOWED BY FLATBED TO STOHLMAN 6/1/99. THE DAMAGE WAS ASSESSED, AND IS STILL AT STOHLMAN DUE TO LACK OF PARTS FROM MITSUBISHI. I HAVE CALLED TO GET AN ESTIMATED COMPLETION DATE FROM SERVICE MGR. GARY BEAVERS, BUT HE WILL NOT GIVE ME ONE. I FIND THIS HIGHLY UNACCEPTABLE, ESPECIALLY DUE TO THE FACT THAT I COULD HAVE BEEN KILLED HAD I BEEN DRIVING AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS WHEN THIS COMPONENT FAILED. I HAVE CONTACTED MITSUBISHI CUSTOMER SERVICE AND THE DEALERSHIP TO TRY AND SECURE A RENTAL VEHICLE OR A LOANER VEHICHLE TO NO AVAIL. PLEASE FEEL FREE TO CONTACT ME AT MY HOME NUMBER OR MY CELLULAR NUMBER (CELL 703.973.7016)  *AK

MY TRANSMISSION COMPUTER HAS FAILED, EVEN AFTER SPENDING MONEY ON A REPLACEMENT. OFCOURSE ONLY AFTER THE WARRANTY ON THE REPLACEMENT PART EXPIRED.  MY TRANSMISSION ITSELF IS ALSO BAD.  NEEDS A COMPLETE OVERHAUL.  DANGEROUS TO DRIVE.  *AK

THE AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION MALFUCTIONS CAUSING SURGING AND NO REVERSE POSITION DUE TO A SEAL WHICH SHRINKS AND DOES NOT LET THE FLUID  FLOW THROUGH.  PLEASE PROVIDE FURTHER INFORMATION.  *AK
